name: atma-aligner
description: Sistema completo Atma Aligner - Frontend, Admin e Backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd Backend && npm install && cd ../Frontend && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync
scripts.version:info: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); console.log('ðŸš€ Atma Aligner v' + pkg.version); console.log('ðŸ“¦ Backend:', require('./Backend/package.json').version); console.log('ðŸ’» Admin:', require('./admin/package.json').version);"
